my email, reenter,

3947.05.text: put your first and last name.

3948.34.text:
You don't have to say
your organization.

3950.32.text:
You don't have to say hello
to the people at Mathematica.

3954.55.text:
And then you press this
button, convert now.

3958.12.text:
I'm not going to do it because
I don't want to get this thing.

3960.73.text:
And it will send you
an email with the link.

3963.99.text:
And when you press on that link
it will download your player

3972.20.text:
And then you can email
it to your grandmother.

3980.24.text:
To me, you can show me
what great things you did

3995.51.text:
Okay we'll see you
I guess a week

4001.04.text:
And like I said before if
you want to study just look

4004.77.text:
over the notes, go over what
we did and remember what it is

4009.19.text:
that we did so it
won't look strange

4012.50.text: when I ask you to do it again.

4015.06.text:
Okay so, so long,
see you next week.
